content: the side closest to you so when you turn your work it changes back loop bl a crochet stitch into the back loop of the previous stitch such as blsc is a single_crochet into the back loop abbreviation name details chain chain yarn over hook pull through 1 one loop on the hook slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook into stitch yarn over hook pull through 2 one loop on the hook blss back loop insert hook into back loop of stitch in previous row yarn over slip_stitch hook pull through 2 one loop on the hook single_crochet single insert hook into stitch in previous row yarn over hook pull crochet through 1 2 loops on hook yarn over hook pull thru 2 one loop on the hook blsc back loop insert hook into back loop of stitch in previous row yarn over pull single through 1 2m loops on hook yarn over pull through 2 one crochet loop on the hook this pattern is for personal use only it cannot be sold redistributed republished online and offline translated without permission and edited as part or in whole no video tutorials are allowed you can sell your finished products but you cannot use my pictures to promote them always credit me as a designer please thank you 4
